# Daily Chores Tracker - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Full-stack Next.js 14 TypeScript web application for tracking daily, weekly, and monthly home chores with reminders.

## Setup Steps
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Customize with chore tracker features
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Create development task
- [x] Finalize documentation

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide React Icons
- Local Storage for persistence

## Project Complete

The Daily Chores Tracker is now fully functional and running at http://localhost:3000
